heroBanner.title: OpenInfra, Cloud Native, Magma & Hyperledger Days India 2022

registration_in_person_disclaimer: If you are registering multiple tickets for other attendees, please select the total number of tickets you would like for this event. After registering, you can assign them to the other attendees by clicking on My Tickets, selecting the ticket you would like to reassign, and clicking on the Re-Assign tab. You can then enter the email address of the other participant to assign the ticket to them.
